nodes.text: Party Poster was a poster available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin, during the Galactic Civil War. The poster had a non-realistic image of a long-haired individual lifting up both hands while looking upward. Written on the poster in Aurebesh characters were the words "Uhl Eharl Khoehng," which meant "The Trickster King" in Olys Corellisi, a language from the planet Corellia that was considered ancient by the time of the Galactic Civil War. Uhl Eharl Khoehng was a Corellian tragedy written in Olys Corellisi.

Party Poster was a poster showing a non-realistic depiction of an individual with long hair looking upward with both hands lifted high above the individual's head. The individual's mouth was open and had a star-shaped object in place of an eye. One of the individual's hands had the index finger pointing upward, while the other hand was held open with a star-shaped object shining brightly from it. At the top, the poster had Aurebesh characters that read: "Uhl Eharl." It also had Aurebesh text at the bottom of the picture, right below the individual, which read "Khoehng." "Uhl Eharl Khoehng" meant "The Trickster King" in Olys Corellisi, a language from the planet Corellia that was considered ancient by the time of the Galactic Civil War.

During the Galactic Civil War, after the Battle of Yavin, the Party Poster was a poster available in the galaxy. The text on the poster was the same as the title of a Corellian tragedy, Uhl Eharl Khoehng, which was written in Olys Corellisi and was considered both ancient and famous by the time of the Galactic Civil War. At some point after the Battle of Yavin, a Party Poster was on one of the walls of the cantina located on Tansarii Point Station.

A spacer found a Party Poster during the Galactic Civil War and thought that the poster was an advertisement for some type of celebration. However, the spacer did not know how long the poster had been around or what the text on the poster was supposed to mean. The spacer thought that the text on the poster might have been slang.

Party Poster was a poster that appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was developed by Sony Online Entertainment and shut down on December 15, 2011. In the game, the poster could be used in players' homes as a wall decoration. The item could be found as loot on various enemies that the player defeated while playing the game, or it could be crafted by a player through the use of a printing kit. In Star Wars Galaxies, the poster could also be found on a wall of the cantina on Tansarii Point Station. The poster's Aurebesh text was the same as the title of a tragedy called Uhl Eharl Khoehng, which first appeared in Uhl Eharl Khoehng, a short story in Star Wars Adventure Journal 8, published by West End Games.
